message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for $120. This is a great opportunity to secure an item valued at $150 for a competitive price.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of your product, but I believe I can find it elsewhere within my budget. I would like to propose a price of $95 for the product.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints. To accommodate your needs while still valuing our product, I am willing to consider $100 for the product. Please let me know if this is acceptable.
